titlestmt.author: compiled by Carol King, Nancy Lyon, and staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 10:50

did.unittitle: Senegal collection

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection consists of printed material and ephemera relating to historical, political, social, and economic conditions in Senegal.

langmaterial.language: The material is in French, English, and Afrikaans.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the African Collection Curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright status for collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Senegal Collection (MS 1539). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: African Collection, MS 605; Pamphlet Collection, MS 1351; African Postcard Collection, MS 1575. Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The material in the original accession is arranged chronologically. Additions to the collection may vary in arrangement.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of printed material and ephemera relating to historical, political, social, and economic conditions in Senegal.

did.unittitle: Original Accession
Certificate authorizing payment to the next of kin of Samuel Bruell, private in the Royal African Regiment of Infantry, deceased; printed document with details of vessels and slaves captured
Jalons, Revue d'Afrique Noire
"Les Sénégalais sout appelés dimanche à approuver le projet de Constitution presenté par M. Senghor," par Ernest Milcent, Le Monde
Newspapers (without political affiliations)
Ministère de l'Information: magazines
"Rapport d'Activités": report of the Office Sénégalais de l'Artisanat
"Disóó: Bulletin périodique du service de la Radio Éducative," Ministère de l'Information et des Télécommunications
Forces Armées Sénégalaises: bulletins
Women's magazines
Centre Sénégalais du Commerce Extérieur: pamphlet
Institute of Current World Affairs: newsletters
Momsarev: publication of the Parti Africain de l'Indépendance (P.A.I. Sénégal)
Political journals
Parti Démocratique Sénégalais (P.D.S.): feminist journals, newspapers, printed materials
Educational/academic journals
Ligue Démocratique/Mouvement pour le Parti du Travail (LD/MPT): news bulletins
Parti de l'Indépendance et du Travail (PIT-Sénégal): bulletins
Union pour la Démocratie Populaire (U.D.P.): news magazine
Mouvement National des Jeunesses Socialistes: newspapers
Parti Socialiste (PS): newspapers
The African Cultural Institute: magazines
Le Cafard Magazine: mensuel d'informations générales et de loisirs
And Jëf/Mouvement Révolutionnaire pour la Démocratie Nouvelle (M.R.D.N.): newspapers
Les Enfants Martyrs, revue d'information de formation et de défense des enfants
Parti pour la Libération du Peuple (PLP): newspapers
Le Travailleur Salarie: bulletin d'information et d'écho des luttes des travailleurs
International Committee for the Defense of African Workers (ICDAW): printed materials
Additional Material
Additional printed materials
Additional Material
Letter from President Leopold Senghor of Senegal to Professor Leonard Thompson [re possibility of sending Senegalese students to UCLA]
Badolo-Bi [Organe de La Section de France du Parti Africain de L'Indépendance]
"Haï" [booklet on poetry from Cercle des Poetes]
"Pour Une Formation à Distance en Education Environnementale" [pamphlet from Programme Régional de Formation-Information pour L'Enviro (PFIE/SUD)]
Additional Material
Publications
BLIBAD: Bullétin de Liaison à L'intention des Bibliothecaires, Archivistes et Documentalistes Africains
L'étudiant sénégalais: Journal d'information et d'opinion de l'Association des Etudiants Sénégalais en France (A.E.S.F.), no. 1
Business advertising cards
Additional Material
